title: Milk (2008) Sean Penn (Nordic DVDrip, opt. subs DK,FI,No,Se)
description:
Milk (2008) Sean Penn (Nordic DVDrip, opt. subs DK,FI,No,Se) <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1013753/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1013753/</a>

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files (Work in Windows Media Player etc., see enclosed Note): Danish, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish. 

Sean Penn's astounding Oscar-performance as a gay activist.

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x368, great stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.

My ripping procedure now produces decent quality for such a long film compressed into just 700 MiB. I enclose a sample for ye weak in faith.
